name: Hell P.D.
description:
A murder has occured in Purgatory. There is currently no check for when the case is "solved," so just feel free to come up with your own idea. (The lava is supposed to kill you btw)

Important: You can use q/e or scroll wheel to scroll through the evidence menu once it gets long. Also, press esc to regain mouse control, and esc then click to refocus the mouse.

This jam was a lot of fun, but I ended up misusing time and cutting a lot of features before the end. I intend to finish this case with a trial when the jam is over, and add some much needed polish.
